descriptionlist.description:
Backup deb file for Cydia, Zebra, and Installer

Hoarded files stored in /var/mobile/Downloads/DebHoarder/.
No option to configure.

Tested on Cydia v0.9, Zebra v1.2~beta8a, Installer v5.1-72, and Sileo v2.5.



To support development: https://www.paypal.me/udevs
